content.title: Shramik Annapurna Yojana (GBOCWWB)
content.department: Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat
content.details: The 'Shramik Annapurna Yojana' is implemented by the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board (GBOCWWB). Under the scheme, the registered construction worker is providing nutritious meals at concessional rates at the workplace or on Kadianaka. Registered construction workers and their family members can get the benefit.
benefits: Healthy and nutritious meals will be provided to the construction workers at a concessional rate of ₹5/- per meal.
eligibility: Construction workers registered with Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board and their family members.
content.application_process: Registered construction workers can avail the benefits by visiting designated locations where nutritious meals are provided, either at the workplace or on Kadianaka.

faqs.question: Who implements the Shramik Annapurna Yojana?
faqs.answer: The scheme is implemented by the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board, Labour, Skill Development & Employment Department, Government of Gujarat.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Registered construction workers and their family members can avail of healthy and nutritious meals at a concessional rate of ₹5/- per meal under this scheme.

faqs.question: Who is eligible to avail of the benefits under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Construction workers who are registered with the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Worker’s Welfare Board, along with their family members, are eligible to avail of the benefits.

faqs.question: How to avail the benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: Registered construction workers can avail of the benefits by visiting designated locations where nutritious meals are provided, either at the workplace or on Kadianaka.

faqs.question: What documents are required to avail of the benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: One of the essential documents required is the e-Nirman Card.

faqs.question: Can family members of registered construction workers also avail of the benefits?
faqs.answer: Yes, family members of registered construction workers are eligible to avail of the benefits under this scheme.
